drawioeditor-noapproved: Displayed when $1 has no approved revision
drawioeditor-approve-link: Link to approve a revision of the diagram
drawioeditor-changeapprove-link: Link to change the approved revision of the diagram

Title for tag inspector in ve to insert drawio tag
drawioeditor-usage: Headline for list of pages which use a particular drawio image. Displayed on the image page

Label for the input field for name of the diagram

drawioeditor-droplet-name: Title of droplet for tag drawio
drawioeditor-droplet-description: Description of droplet for tag drawio
drawioeditor-ve-drawio-alt-label: Label for the input field for the alt text of the diagram
drawioeditor-ve-drawio-alt-help: Help text for the input field for alt text of the diagram
drawioeditor-config-backendurl: Label for input field to set config variable for "Backend URL"
drawioeditor-config-backendurl-help: Help text for input field to set config variable for "Backend URL"
drawioeditor-ve-drawio-alignment-label: Label for the input field for the alignment of the diagram
drawioeditor-ve-drawio-alignment-help: Help text for the input field for alignment of the diagram
drawioeditor-config-customshapelibraries: Label for input field to set config variable for "Custom shape libraries"

drawioeditor-ve-drawio-alignment-label-r: Label for the option to align the diagram to the right
